page.title: 02VILLAGE COMMUNITY,DALWOOD.
page.content: Most typifying Dalwood is its thriving community spirit. People in the village work cooperatively on many village projects. The local school enjoys the support of the whole community in fund raising,project work and helpers in school. The school in turn is involved in village events such as Fair Week, May Day Celebrations and Harvest Festival. There is a thriving Women's Institute, Parochial Church Council and Village Hall Committee. A whole week of events is organised by the villagers during Fair Week including a concert in the Village Hall and a Fancy Dress Parade. The whole village is involved.
